tissueExpression.summary: Cytoplasmic and membranous staining in most epithelial and lymphatic tissues.

subcellularLocation.summary: Mainly localized to the plasma membrane but also to the Golgi apparatus.

tissueExpression.summary: Squamous epithelium displayed a distinct strong cytoplasmic and membranous positivity. Basal cells of respiratory epithelium were also strong positive. Remaining normal cells were negative.
Squamous cell carcinomas, melanomas and skin cancers showed strong cytoplasmic and membranous positivity. Remaining malignancies were negative.
Most normal cells showed strong membranous positivity.
Tumor stroma showed distinct positivity. Most malignancies displayed strong membranous immunoreactivity. Testis cancer were negative.
Strong membranous immunoreactivity, accompanied with weak cytoplasmic staining was observed in squamous epithelia and lymphoid tissues. Most other normal tissues were negative.

Moderate to strong membranous immunoreactivity, often accompanied with weak cytoplasmic staining, was observed in a few cases of most tumor types. Most positivity was found in malignant melanomas and cervical cancers.
